indications: ambrisentan tablets indicated treatment pulmonary arterial hypertension ( pah ) ( group 1 ) adult patients : improve exercise ability delay worsening . establishing effectiveness included predominantly patients functional class ii iii symptoms etiologies idiopathic heritable pah ( 60 % ) pah associated connective tissue diseases ( 34 % ) .
contraindications: • initiate treatment 5 mg daily ( 2.1 ) . • titrate 4-week intervals needed tolerated ( 2.1 ) . • split , crush , chew tablets ( 2.1 ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: ambrisentan tablets 5 mg pale pink , film-coated , square shaped convex tablets debossed “ ” one side “ 5 ” side supplied follows : bottles 30 ndc 59651-494-30 ambrisentan tablets 10 mg deep pink , film-coated , oval shaped convex tablets debossed “ ” one side “ 10 ” side supplied follows : bottles 30 ndc 59651-495-30 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . store ambrisentan tablets original packaging .
name: ambrisentan
indications_original:
Ambrisentan tablets are indicated for the treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) (WHO Group 1) in adult patients:
                  
                  
                     To improve exercise ability and delay clinical worsening.
                  
                  Studies establishing effectiveness included predominantly patients with WHO Functional Class II to III symptoms and etiologies of idiopathic or heritable PAH (60%) or PAH associated with connective tissue diseases (34%).
contraindications_original: • Initiate treatment at 5 mg once daily ( 2.1 ). • Titrate at 4-week intervals as needed and tolerated ( 2.1 ). • Do not split, crush, or chew tablets ( 2.1 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ambrisentan Tablets 5 mg are pale pink, film-coated, square shaped convex tablets debossed with “AS” on one side and “5” on other side and are supplied as follows:
                  
                  Bottles of 30                                       NDC   59651-494-30
                  
                  
                     Ambrisentan Tablets 10 mg are deep pink, film-coated, oval shaped convex tablets debossed with “AS” on one side and “10” on other side and are supplied as follows:
                  
                  Bottles of 30                                       NDC   59651-495-30
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Store ambrisentan tablets in its original packaging.
